price: 37. Ese día todos estarán ocupados, preocupados por su propio devenir.
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
